settings.text:
An exchange request must be submitted within 14 days of receiving your order.


The item(s) must be in their original condition, with all tags still attached. Exchanges will be denied for any garments that appear to have been worn, washed, or altered in any way. Please be cautious when trying on clothes because we cannot accept garments with makeup stains or that smell of perfume. Before a refund or exchange can be issued, the item(s) must be returned to our warehouse. The ability to fulfill exchange requests is contingent on garment availability at the time the return is received for processing.

Only approved returns will be accepted. Any returns sent without authorization will be refused, and the customer will be responsible for arranging collection of their garment.

If you have met the above requirements, please email us at mixedgals.contact@gmail.com to complete your exchange. We recommend using a registered postal service to return goods and keeping a record of the tracking information, as we cannot be held liable for the loss of your returned item.

settings.heading: How long will it take to process my exchange?

settings.text: Please allow up to 5-7 business days for our team to process your return once we receive it. We'll send you an email once your exchange has shipped to let you know it's on its way. Please keep in mind that exchanges are subject to availability at the time your return is received and processed by our warehouse team.
We do not cover or reimburse the shipping costs of returning an item(s) to our store for an exchange.
